docs.lead_paragraph: This post contains spoilers. As we have warned you before on such posts, the next sentence you read will almost certainly spoil something for you.
docs.abstract: It is June 1963 and everything is happening against the backdrop of Medgar Evers's murder, including the birth of the Drapers' third child.

docs.lead_paragraph: Interviews with documentarians found that they often operated under ad hoc ethical codes and were intent on a desire for social justice.

headline.seo: At Toronto Film Festival,  Cautions on Documentaries
headline.main: At Toronto Film Festival, Cautions on Documentaries
headline.print_headline: At Festival, a Splash From Michael Moore but Cautions on Documentaries

docs.snippet: Interviews with documentarians found that they often operated under ad hoc ethical codes and were intent on a desire for social justice.

docs.lead_paragraph: Mexico last month adopted a law that decriminalizes the possession of small amounts of marijuana and harder drugs, including cocaine and heroin. Other countries in Latin America are considering similar changes in their laws, prompting antidrug groups in the U.S. to say that pressure from south of the border will push the United States toward decriminalization, if not legalization, of drugs.

headline.main: What Will Mexico's New Drug Law Do?

docs.abstract: Latin America's big experiment: Marijuana and harder drugs, out in the open.
docs.snippet: Latin America's big experiment: Marijuana and harder drugs, out in the open.

docs.lead_paragraph: Although spider veins are usually not considered a serious medical condition,  experts say they indicate other underlying venous issues, including a sluggish circulatory system.

headline.seo: New Treatments Help Remove Spider Veins
headline.main: Removing the Web of Spider Veins
headline.print_headline: Removing The Web Of Spider Veins

docs.snippet: Although spider veins are usually not considered a serious medical condition,  experts say they indicate other underlying venous issues, including a sluggish circulatory system.

docs.lead_paragraph: Tonight, President Obama will give a much-awaited speech laying out the case for health care reform. Almost exactly 16 years ago, President Bill Clinton did the exact same thing.
docs.abstract: President Obama's speech tonight laying out the case for health care reform will echo almost exactly 16 years ago, when Bill Clinton did the exact same thing, and with language that could be used today.
docs.snippet: President Obama's speech tonight laying out the case for health care reform will echo almost exactly 16 years ago, when Bill Clinton did the exact same thing, and with language that could be used today.

docs.lead_paragraph: Health workers were able to improve their ability to help women in Peru during childbirth by asking about their local traditions.

headline.main: Pregnancy: Clinic in Rural Peru Draws More Women by Following Local Childbirth Traditions
headline.print_headline: Clinic in Rural Peru Draws More Women By Following Local Childbirth Traditions
